id.title: Survey ID
id.description: A string that uniquely identifies this survey.

web_id.title: Survey Web ID
web_id.description: The ID used in the Mailchimp web application. View this survey report in your Mailchimp account at `https://{dc}.admin.mailchimp.com/lists/surveys/results?survey_id={web_id}`.

list_id.title: List ID
list_id.description: The ID of the list connected to this survey.

list_name.title: List Name
list_name.description: The name of the list connected to this survey.

published_at.title: Published At
published_at.description: The date and time the survey was published in ISO 8601 format.

created_at.title: Created At
created_at.description: The date and time the survey was created in ISO 8601 format.

updated_at.title: Updated At
updated_at.description: The date and time the survey was last updated in ISO 8601 format.

total_responses.title: Total Responses
total_responses.description: The total number of responses to this survey.
